snippet.title: Rubinite - Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Demo Page：https://store.steampowered.com/app/2320010/
🐰 The demo will be officially released next Friday, September 20th, at 2 PM GMT+8! 🐰

"Rubinite" is a dark fantasy boss rush action game that utilizes the unique mechanic "Focus" to pinpoint enemies' weaknesses and execute thrust attacks. 
Follow Ruby, a princess who has escaped from the Scarlet Kingdom, embarking on a journey of revenge to reclaim her kingdom.

Follow CupDogGames
🔸Website : https://www.cupdoggames.com/
🔸Twitter | X : https://twitter.com/cupdog_games
🔸FaceBook : https://www.facebook.com/CupDogGames
🔸Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/cupdoggames/ 
🔸Discord: https://discord.com/invite/N3MudeHMCJ
